name: Synapseco
overview: Online marketing is a complex phenomenon that is taking over the world at a break neck speed. The sooner the businesses realize it the better it is for them. However the selection of the company that would do the best of jobs must be made discerningly. At SynapseIndia we offer the entire spectrum of software development services under one umbrella. Our expertise in various software development services is known the world over. A brief description of the service we offer are: Custom websites & web application development, Magneto, Drupal, osCommerce, Joomla, AspDotNetStorefront, DotNetNuke (DNN), iPhone / iPad applications, Android, Windows 8 Phone apps, Amazon Webstore Design & Development, Custom software development, Sharepoint Programming & Silverlight, development, Web & graphic design, Flex & RIA (Rich internet application) development, MLS based Real Estate Website Development, Mobile Event Site Development & Mobile E-Commerce/Shopping Website. Our work becomes our clients’ business Armour.
